name: Flashlight (No Ads)
description: Brightest flashlight is an application that allows you to use camera light or the phone screen as a flashlight. Use case: Torchlight in the dark , Light Your Room During a Power Outage, Repair Your Car etc.  Main features pocket torch:  - Free App - No Ads - LED flashlight - Quickly and easily turns on the Torchlight - Screen flashlight - Customize Screen Colors - SOS mode (Morse Code) - Material Design
